title.text: On the geolinguistic change in Northern France between 1300 and 1900: a dialectometrical inquiry

abstractContent.text: With the supply of 8 closely interpreted dialectometrical maps, this paper analyses the linguistic change of the geolinguistic deep structures in Northern France (Do-maine d'Oïl) between 1300 and 1900.
As a matter of fact, the result will show-with one exception-the great stability of these deep structures.
